I'm huge in Canada

#17 in Kamloops, BC (that's near Vancouver)

CFBX 92.5 FM, Cable 106.1 - The X
Campus/Community Radio in Kamloops, BC
Charts to January 11, 2008
* indicates Canadian Content
** indicates a local artist

Artist - Album (Label)

1) The Hives - The Black and White Album (A&M)
2) Echo Hunters* - Cabin Fever (SheWolf)
3) Gorillaz - D-Sides (Virgin)

(Appropriate)
5) Dragonette* - Galore (Universal)

Sessions from CJSW (Independent)

(Heartbeat)

(Independent)
